com.microsoft.aad.adal4j

Class AsymmetricKeyCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.aad.adal4j.AsymmetricKeyCredential

  • public final class AsymmetricKeyCredential
extends java.lang.Object
    Credential type containing X509 public certificate and RSA private key.

      • create

        public static AsymmetricKeyCredential create(java.lang.String clientId,
                                             java.io.InputStream pkcs12Certificate,
                                             java.lang.String password)
                                      throws java.security.KeyStoreException,
                                             java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                             java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                             java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                                             java.io.IOException,
                                             java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException
        Static method to create KeyCredential instance.
        Parameters:
        clientId - Identifier of the client requesting the token.
        pkcs12Certificate - PKCS12 certificate stream containing public and private key. Caller is responsible for handling the input stream.
        password - certificate password
        Returns:
        KeyCredential instance
        Throws:
        java.security.KeyStoreException - KeyStoreException
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - NoSuchProviderException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.cert.CertificateException - CertificateException
        java.io.IOException - IOException
        java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException - UnrecoverableKeyException

      • create

        public static AsymmetricKeyCredential create(java.lang.String clientId,
                                             java.security.PrivateKey key,
                                             java.security.cert.X509Certificate publicCertificate)
        Static method to create KeyCredential instance.
        Parameters:
        clientId - Identifier of the client requesting the token.
        key - RSA private key to sign the assertion.
        publicCertificate - Public certificate used for thumb print.
        Returns:
        KeyCredential instance
